name: Mage Arena
description:
Surrounded in the Goblin king arena, will you survive the goblin onslaught? How many waves will it take to bring you down?

Fight them off with the fire spell. Right hand to cast (circle gesture) where you look.

Left hand to move.

Gesture forward to move to where you are looking.

Pinch and then Gesture Up to quickly do a 180.

Pinch and then Left or Right to re-position your viewpoint left/right (comfort rotate).

Push your left hand forward to move and begin. Each incoming wave will begin when the last one is dead, and will make a recognizable sound to indicate it has begun.

Press 'Escape' to exit.

Update

v1.2 brings new enemies (from wave 2 onward), slightly more cohesive visuals and better leap motion tracking as well as misc bugfixes.

v1.3 updated to support Consumer Rift (CV1)
